definitions.definition: A heterocyclic organic compound containing two nitrogen atoms separated by a carbon atom in a five-membered ring, called 1,3- diazole in IUPAC nomenclature .
A group of compounds containing that structure .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A heterocyclic organic compound containing two nitrogen atoms separated by a carbon atom in a five-membered ring, called 1,3- diazole in IUPAC nomenclature .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry ) A group of compounds containing that structure .
